name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleashed Fury: Chainsaw Man, Blade of Darkness Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the Blade of Darkness with Chainsaw Man in action, featuring dynamic visuals, shortcuts, and a sleek design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Chainsaw Man wielding his blade in a dramatic, dark setting.
Minimalist Design: Streamlined interface for smooth and focused browsing.
Clock and Date: Stay organized with time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate easily to popular websites.
Google Search Bar: Convenient and fast search functionality.
More Extension: Enhance your browsing experience with added features.
